column5: Just putting this out as an time saving measure for those who want to. Just purchased my fishing license on line took less than 3 minutes. Now have in my wallet and one less thing to do upon arrival in camp.
can you do this for quebec also?
And to add to that, you can also renew your Ontario Outdoors Card online as well. I checked mine last night, and was quite pleased when I realized that I am good for another year.
How much convenience fee did they charge you for their convenience?
No extra charge......I buy my license this way every year. Already in my pocket for May.
I actually watched the exchange rate and when it went to 70 cents on the dollar I bought my license. We get annual licenses so maybe saved a few bucks!

I also renewed my Outdoor Card and purchased the Ontario 2016 fishing license. I printed out a temporary Outdoor Card, and a permanent card followed in the mail a couple weeks later. I printed out the fishing license which I have in my file. I have received nothing in the mail. My question is then, is my printed license all I will have and/or need? Thanks, Phil
yes....nothing will come in the mail

I get my license thru e-license every year. So much easier. One of the guys in our group got his license and out door card this year and on the back of the outdoor card it had his license for the week we are going. That's a first for me but always print out 3 copies of the license in case I lose one. I also got my Canadian money already from my bank . I,m ready!! Just waiting now. Have a good trip.
